DESCRIPTION:

Play with a terrible name Painkiller: Hell & Damnation, which in Russian means "Hell and Curse" - a remake of the original Painkiller, appeared on the market in 2004.

To begin with, the level of graphics that are not down - thanks to the Unreal Engine 3 on location still look great. Levels have not undergone almost no changes (except the previously unknown location enriched secret areas). But the story is new. Magical action takes place after the events of the first part. In addition, a significantly improved physics.

Authors from The Farm 51 gamers will enjoy more fresh and network modes, online tournaments and other Internet goodies.
